snippet: An Ebola patient in Sierra Leone will be transported to a hospital on Saturday if he is healthy enough to make the trip, hospital officials said.
abstract: Hospital officials say an Ebola patient in Sierra Leone will arrive at Nebraska Medical Center if he can be transported safely; would be third person treated for the virus at center's special biocontainment unit in Omaha .
lead_paragraph: An Ebola patient in Sierra Leone will be transported to a hospital on Saturday if he is healthy enough to make the trip, hospital officials said.

headline.main: Nebraska: Center to Treat Ebola Patient
headline.print_headline: Nebraska: Center to Treat Ebola Patient
